verses.verse: We give thanks<WH3034> to you,<WH430> God. We give thanks,<WH3034> for your Name<WH8034> is near.<WH7138> Men tell<WH5608> about your wondrous works.<WH6381>
When I choose<WH3947> the appointed<WH4150> time,<WH8199> I will judge blamelessly.<WH4339>
The earth<WH776> and all its inhabitants<WH3427> quake.<WH4127> I firmly hold<WH8505> its pillars.<WH5982> Selah.<WH5542>
I said<WH559> to the arrogant,<WH1984> "Don't<WH1984> boast!" I said to the wicked,<WH7563> "Don't<WH7311> lift up the horn.<WH7161>
Don't<WH7311> lift up your horn<WH7161> on high.<WH4791> Don't<WH1696> speak with a stiff<WH6277> neck.<WH6677>"
For neither from the east,<WH4161> nor from the west,<WH4628> nor yet from the south,<WH4057> comes exaltation.<WH7311>
But God<WH430> is the judge.<WH8199> He puts down<WH8213> one,<WH7311> and lifts up another.

For in the hand<WH3027> of Yahweh<WH3068> there is a cup,<WH3563> full of foaming<WH2560> wine<WH3196> mixed<WH4538> with spices.<WH4392> He pours it<WH2088> out.<WH5064> Indeed the wicked<WH7563> of the earth<WH776> drink<WH4680> and drink<WH8354> it to its very dregs.<WH8105>
But I will declare<WH5046> this forever:<WH5769> I will sing praises<WH2167> to the God<WH430> of Jacob.<WH3290>
I will cut off all the horns<WH7161> of the wicked,<WH7563> but the horns<WH7161> of the righteous<WH6662> shall be lifted up.<WH7311>
